Docs.summary: Extends design-time behavior for the control.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the action list collection for the control designer.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of a specific table or view in the data source object to bind the control to.
Docs.value: The name of a table or view in the data source.

Docs.summary: A data-binding expression that identifies the source of data for the associated control.
Provides access to the associated designer component for the data source.

Docs.summary: Gets the object associated with the data source of this designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the disposing parameter is `true`, the `Dispose` method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner> object references.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExecuteChooseDataSourcePostSteps() cil managed

Docs.summary: Called by a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] after a user selects a data source at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is available for derived classes that require additional processing after a user selects a data source at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource(int32 minimumRows) cil managed

Docs.param: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
Docs.summary: Returns design-time sample data based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method and using the specified number of rows.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object containing sample data for use at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource (System.Collections.IEnumerable selectedDataSource, int minimumRows);
.method familyhidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource(class System.Collections.IEnumerable selectedDataSource, int32 minimumRows) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object containing data to use in creating similar sample data at design time.
The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
Docs.summary: Returns design-time sample data based on the provided data and using the specified number of rows.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object containing sample data for use at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the HTML markup to be used for the design-time representation of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the HTML markup to represent a Web server control at design time that will have no visual representation at run time.
Docs.returns: The HTML markup used to represent a control at design time that would otherwise have no visual representation. The default is a rectangle that contains the type and ID of the component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the HTML markup that provides information about the specified exception.
Docs.returns: The design-time HTML markup for the specified exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetResolvedSelectedDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the selected data member from the selected data source.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that contains a collection of values used to supply design-time data. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The GetResolvedSelectedDataSource method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetSelectedDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the selected data source component from the container of the associated control.
Docs.returns: The selected data source; if a data source is not found or if a data source with the selected name does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The GetSelectedDataSource method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.RepeaterDesigner.DataSource%2A> property.
